backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and CRUD operations for user goals with access control enforcement and per-user goal storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app modifications to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, themes, and shared base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry defining authentication flow, layout, and all primary routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/app/AppBottomNav: Mobile bottom navigation bar component listing Home, Settings, Profile, Stats, and Averages links.
frontend/src/components/app/AppNav.tsx: Desktop navigation bar with links to goals, creation, stats, and settings, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Application shell providing header, navigation, footer, and conditional mobile bottom nav around page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Sign-in/sign-out UI using Internet Identity with loading states and profile display for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/goals/AddGoalBut: Floating button that navigates to the goal creation page.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalCard.t: Displays a goal with progress, swipe-to-complete, and navigation to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/goals/GoalForm.t: Form for creating or editing a goal with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/state/EmptyGoals: Empty state UI encouraging the user to create their first goal.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Shows skeleton loaders for goal lists and goal detail views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and goals through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark CSS variable themes with base styling.
frontend/src/lib/goals/types.ts: Provides helpers mapping goal statuses to labels and UI colors, plus a constant list of statuses.
frontend/src/lib/goals/validation.ts: Contains validation functions for goal title and progress constraints.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Utility functions for converting, formatting, and displaying time values stored as nanoseconds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AveragesPage.tsx: Displays average progress and completion stats across all goals with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateGoalPage.tsx: Renders a form for creating a new goal and submits it before navigating home.
frontend/src/pages/GoalDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed goal info with edit and delete functionality, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboardPage.ts: Lists goals with status filtering, loading/error views, and an add-goal button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile info with loading and error handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page that loads the caller's profile, allows editing the display name with validation, and saves updates with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays goal statistics by fetching all goals, showing counts and progress summaries, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, container settings, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's state, features, and pending requests related to removing settings and adding a goal creation button.
